department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Shield with applied decoration, two half-loops applied at center, at right angles, vertical applied line separates halves, six rectangular shaped areas of applied decoration four with screen-like designs, two with parallel diagonal lines, back has central vertical applied element with bulbous protrusion on top and bottom ends
markings: White paint, on back, \'164\'; sticker, on back, covered with scotch tape
title: Goldweight [Shield]
